name: Air Hockey - Accessible Game - Simple Control System
name_original: Air Hockey - Accessible Game - Simple Control System
description:
A simple paddle board game with a choice of computer opponents or play against another player. Left mouse button or spacebar controls this game. Always a popular style of game. I like how this has difficulty settings and the option to play against another human player.

Welcome to my corner of the internet.

On my site I create games that can be played with a single input device, allowing my games to accessible to everyone.

All games can be played using just the left-mouse-button; no mouse movement required.

I have set up games to play with just the left mouse button, or any other input device directly or via a switch unit that can 'register' a left mouse click.

For info on my games, please visit: www.EasyToPlayGames.com
